channel.title: Source of 2008 and 2009
channel.description:
What would you say the best source of 2008 and 2009 was?
I say Richscape V4
P.S - If you say Delta your gay.

item.title: Source of 2008 and 2009
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

DeltaScape.
I’m not gay.

Read full topic

item.title: Source of 2008 and 2009
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Lin:

DeltaScape. I hate how people suck, but it’s the source I use for my server needs because of its performance. If you don’t know what I mean, I’m talking about picking up items, instant walking, walking away, etc… Unlike all other servers, where stuff is just slower and laggy. With just a little work, it’s a great source. Of course, stability may be missing when player count gets high, but that’s how it is when you use a wL-based server.

You can easily implement those in a few minutes, I don’t see the point of starting off with a server that already has tons of shit added, when the point is to make everything work the way to want it. Which would be made way easier when starting from scratch (or at least from a very clean server with basic features).

Read full topic

item.title: Source of 2008 and 2009
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:25, topic:285231”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=376965.msg2853431#msg2853431 date=1246678347]

If you say Delta your gay.

I think you’re the fag making this thread, why would you bother making this thread? '08 and ‘09 are covered with DeltaScape sources, you know there just going to be spammed all over the thread.
[/quote]That, and the fact that Delta was actually a legitimately built source. It had a decent variety in gameplay unlike the average moparscape source; npc-spam, rares galore, max hit of 150.[/quote]I remember those servers, the first one that caused most to be bad, GangstaScape (though the name was taken so the creator changed it to GangstuhLand), had probably 500 monkeys bunched up spamming “OMFG FREEE GANGSTA SKILLZ, ATTK ME!!”, then you had this wish thing, you use 5K on the well and you get about 20 party hats, had NPCs all around the well spamming “OMFG LOOT WELL USE 5K ON IT U GET NICE LOOT z0mfg!!!”, then the latest update which just about fucked the entire server, then he quit “GangstuhLand”, he added a barrage mini-game, with probably a hundred Moss Giant standing in the middle and you had to barrage them, since multi attack was on, everytime you barraged everyone around that place crashed - he didn’t add a description to those few hundred Moss Giant’ in the Autospawn cfg file, and he ended up quitting because he couldn’t get rid of it, came back an hour later or so what he tried to do was take barrage off, everytime someone barraged the server crashed (then quit) - I still think DeltaScape would be rated better and alot more than crappy sources like GangstuhLand.

Read full topic

item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:23, topic:285231”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=376965.msg2853024#msg2853024 date=1246655789]
iClarity is quite a nice source, '09, I mainly like it due to the packaging, and the structure of the server.
[/quote]I’m using it now. It’s amazing compared to anything from '08.[/quote]

I recommend you use my next release of iClarity, because I found a few things that caused the ‘lag’. On my computer it now uses 3x less CPU than V1 :).

item.title: Source of 2008 and 2009
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It was either Richscape or Deltascape for '08 no doubt. Delta was completely overrated though and i hated it; Richscape ftw. Most people don’t realize that Rich and Delta actually helped each other though. ;]

For '09? I haven’t really been around to pay attention to any recently, although most of the better sources come out during the summer.

[size=3pt]Version 3s…[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Source of 2008 and 2009
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

ServerSoft:

Non of them, they all suck. Sorry for being so rude, but every single one is so basic, and very easy. The only one I ever really liked, and in this case is the best one I’ve ever seen was ‘Mithscape’. It may not be totally awsome and all, but it’s the best i’ve ever seen, compared to every other usless one. My source i’ve been working on for 7 straight months, 2 of those months I was a beginner so I didn’t know how to code at first, but just like RuneScape does, I just add stuff everytime somone requests an update. I’d vote my source.

Basically every server listed on this thread is shitty, yes, but I guarantee you that yours isn’t any better then the next guy’s.

Read full topic
